name: Ramag Portal Master
description: The Ramag Portal Master is a humanoid with exceptional intelligence and magical abilities, wearing no armor but capable of enhancing its protection with mage armor.
memorable: This creature can create magical gateways and suppress teleportation, making it a unique tactical adversary.
goals: To manipulate space and control the battlefield using its spellcasting and abilities.
relations: Might be encountered with other spellcasters and planar beings, potentially serving a greater mage or planar entity.
environment: Usually found in areas rich in magical energy or near portals and planar gates.
strengths: Possesses a strong suite of crowd control spells and magic resistance, making it a strategic foe.
weaknesses: Moderate armor class and poor physical combat abilities due to an average strength score.
attacks: Can make two lightning stroke attacks dealing significant lightning damage while preventing reactions from the target.
most_powerful_ability: Dimensional Seal, which hinders all teleportation and planar travel in its vicinity.
skills: Highly proficient in arcana, history, and investigation, showcasing its scholarly prowess.
additional_information: Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can create gateways for rapid movement across the battlefield.
Has access to strong area spells like fireball and crowd control spells.
Powerful spellcasting with a spell save DC of 15.
Can paralyze with hold person or banish creatures to other planes.
spellcasting: 7th-level spellcaster with access to various damaging and control spells.
